title: Seeded Goat's Cheese & Beetroot Grain Bowl with Pesto Dressing (V)
keywords: Goat's cheese, Beetroot, Grain bowl, Pesto, Vegetarian, Seeded, Modern European

method.step: Boil a kettle
Rince your quinoa in a sieve under cold running water
Add your quinoa to a large pot with plenty of boiled water and bring to boil over a heigh heat
Once boiling, reduce the heat to medium and cook for an initial 6-7 minutes
Meanwhile, chop your tenderstem broccoli into thirds
Drain and rinse your green lentils
Drain your beetroot in a colander over the sink
Chop the drained beetroot into rough, bite size pieces
Wash your salad and put it dry with kitchen paper
After the initial 6-7 minutes, add the chopped tenderstem to the pot the quinoa pot
Cook for an initial 3-4 minutes or until the broccoli is tender with a slight bite and all the quinoa is tender
Combine your pesto with your white wine vinegar and your olive oil
Add a pinch of salt pepper and sugar and give everything a good mix up.  This is your pesto dressing
Drain, the cooked quinoa & broccoli and rinse under cold running water
Drain and return to the pot
Add the drained lentils to the pot with your chopped beetroot cashews and salad
Add half your pesto dressing and a verry generous pinch of salt and stir it all together. This is your grain salad.
Serve the green salad and crumble your goatâ€™s cheese all over
Drizzle with the reserved pesto dressing and garnish with you9r pumpkin seeds
Enjoy
